scripts.after-pull: php artisan migrate && php artisan optimize:clear && composer dump-autoload
scripts.start: concurrently "php artisan serve" "php artisan queue:work" "npm run dev"
scripts.clear: php artisan cache:clear && php artisan route:clear && php artisan config:clear && php artisan view:clear && php artisan event:clear && php artisan optimize:clear
scripts.cache: php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache
